Translations.Text: hypocrites those harbored doubt their hearts dictus These people deceived their religionis. si unus puts his trust DEUS tunc DEUS est Almighty Wise
Vos unus vide those disbelieved when angels put them decessus! They beat them their faces their rear finis Taste retribution Hell
Hoc est consequence quod tuus manus sent forth DEUS est NUNQUAM unjust towards creatures
Hoc est same fate ut de Pharaoh's people those disbelieved them! They rejected deus revelations DEUS punished them pro their sins DEUS est powerful His retribution est severe
DEUS NON change BEATUS He bestowed any people they decide change DEUS est Hearer Omniscient
Such est case people de Pharaoh others them. They primas rejected signum their Dominus. Consequently nos annihilated them their sins Nos drowned Pharaoh's people wicked consistently punished
Malus creatures sight DEUS est those disbelieved they non believe
Vos reach agreements them they violate their agreements omnis temporis; they non est righteous
Ergo si vos encounter them in war vos set them prout deterrent example those advenit them ut they take heed
When vos betrayed group de people vos mobilize them same moris! DEUS NON love betrayers
